docs.lead_paragraph: Among biological weapons, smallpox is in a class by itself. Even as a team of investigators descends on Florida in response to a death from anthrax, it is smallpox that has many experts losing sleep.

headline.main: U.S. Acts to Make Vaccines and Drugs Against Smallpox

docs.abstract: United States is taking number of steps to counter remote possibly of terrorist attack with smallpox virus; studies stretching existing vaccine stocks; plans to speed up output of new vaccine; researchers weigh using antiviral drugs to fight disease in unvaccinated people; diagrams; photos (M)
docs.snippet: Among biological weapons, smallpox is in a class by itself.    Even as a team of investigators descends on Florida in response to a death from anthrax, it is smallpox that has many experts losing sleep.
